nodes.text: Ani'anti was a Human male pilot of the Black Sun crime syndicate during the time of the Galactic Civil War. Sometime following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, a pilot engaged Ani'anti in the Corellian system, and destroyed him.

Ani'anti appeared aboard a starship in Jump to Lightspeed, the 2004 expansion pack for the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
